MNKD Pricing in Brazil will be key The CMED establishes drug pricing limits adopts rules that encourage competition in the industry monitors the marketing and applies penalties when its rules are breached It is also responsible for setting and monitoring the application of the minimum compulsory discount for public purchases

MNKD PPS entered a downward channel 03192019 Exited 053102019 It is clear that that the negative trendline has been broken probably due to script growth over 700 and approval in Australia and now Brazil Therefore the goal of shorts is to kill off any momentum on low volume and to disguise the break in the negative trendline by keeping it under the radar eg 001 or 002 cents Further positive news which frankly could break at ANY time will benefit PPS significantly taking it above 250 in short order
